price: او له هغو خلكو نه چې موږ پيدا كړي يوه ډله په حقه ښوونه كوي او په همدې سره انصاف كوي.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wamimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
